Action Example Description
Help ? Display context sensitive help
Aliases ctrl-a List available cluster resources and aliases
Exit :q, ctrl-c Terminates the application
Bails out of view/command/filter mode <esc> Â 
View a resource :pod Accepts singular, plural, short-name or alias
ie :po,:pod,:pods to list pods
View a resource in a namespace :pod default Â 
Filter out a resource view given a filter /fred Regex2 supported ie fred|blee to filter resources named fred or blee
Inverse regex filer /! fred Keep everything that doesnâ€™t match.
Filter resource by labels /-l app=fredâ filter pods with labels app=fred
Fuzzy find a resource given a filter /-f frd Â

List all available Contexts :ctxâ List all available from kubeconfig or env var
Navigate to a given context :ctx context-nameâ Switch to fred context :ctx fred
List all available namespaces :nsâ Â 
To view all saved resources :screendump or sdâ View all screen dump
To delete a resource ctrl-d Dialog pops up to confirm (use TAB/SHIFT-TAB,ENTER to navigate fields
Force delete a resource ctrl-k WARN! Power users ie No confirmation dialog
